abort.reauth_successful: Philips Hue Play HDMI Sync Box kopperling gelukt

user.title: Voor apparaat informatie in
user.description:
De informatie is beschikbaar in de Hue App.

Selecteer de Sync tab en selecteer de Philips Hue Play HDMI Syncbox. Daarna druk boven aan het scherm op het â€¦ menu, selecteer Apparaat. Onder Netwerkinfo staat het IP addres en onder Apparaatinfo staat Identificatie.

reauth_confirm.title: Integratie opnieuw koppelen
reauth_confirm.description: De Philips Hue Play HDMI Sync Box moet opnieuw gekoppeld worden

zeroconf_confirm.title: Apparaat gevonden
zeroconf_confirm.description: Druk op Volgende om het koppelen van de Philips Hue Play HDMI Sync Box te starten.

progress.wait_for_button: Druk een paar seconden op de knop van de Philips Hue Play HDMI Sync Box totdat het lampje groen knippert.

set_bridge.name: Set bridge
set_bridge.description: Set the bridge to be used by the Philips Hue Play HDMI Syncbox. Keep in mind that changing the bridge by the box takes a while (about 15 seconds it seems). After the bridge has changed you might need to select the `entertainment_area` if connectionstate is `invalidgroup` instead of `connected`.

bridge_id.name: Bridge ID
bridge_id.description: ID of the bridge. A hexadecimal code of 16 characters.

bridge_username.name: Username
bridge_username.description: Username (a.k.a. application key) valid for the bridge. A long code of random characters.

bridge_clientkey.name: Clientkey
bridge_clientkey.description: Clientkey that belongs with the username. A hexadecimal code of 32 characters.

set_sync_state.name: Set light sync state
set_sync_state.description: Control the complete light sync state of the Philips Hue Play HDMI Syncbox with one call.

power.name: Power
power.description: Turn the box on or off.

sync.name: Light sync
sync.description: Set light sync state on or off. Setting this to on will also turn on the box.

mode.name: Mode
mode.description: Mode to set. Setting the mode will also turn on the box and start light sync.

entertainment_area.name: Entertainment area
entertainment_area.description: Entertainment area to select. Name must match _exactly_

confirm.title: Update the automations
